biotools.summary: Coordinated set of pipelines to analyze piRNA (PIWI-interacting RNAs) and transposon-derived RNAs from a variety of high-throughput sequencing libraries, including small RNA, RNA, degradome or 7-methyl guanosine cap analysis of gene expression (CAGE), chromatin immunoprecipitation (ChIP) and genomic DNA-seq.

bioschemas.name: piPipes
bioschemas.summary: Coordinated set of pipelines to analyze piRNA (PIWI-interacting RNAs) and transposon-derived RNAs from a variety of high-throughput sequencing libraries, including small RNA, RNA, degradome or 7-methyl guanosine cap analysis of gene expression (CAGE), chromatin immunoprecipitation (ChIP) and genomic DNA-seq.
